articles.title: Celine Dion reveals she has a rare neurological syndrome - CNN
articles.description: Celine Dion is postponing several Europe tour dates after the recent diagnosis of a rare neurological disorder that doesn't allow her "to sing the way I'm used to," she announced.
articles.content:

articles.title: Céline Dion says she's dealing with neurological condition known as stiff-person syndrome - CBC News
articles.description: Céline Dion apologized to her fans in Europe in an emotional social media post on Thursday, saying the rare neurological condition stiff-person syndrome is preventing her from hitting the stage for previously scheduled shows in the spring and summer.

articles.title: EU backs Croatia’s entry into Schengen, rejects Bulgaria, Romania - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The European Council approves the admission of Croatia to the passport-free Schengen area from January 1.
articles.content:
European Union members have confirmed the admission of Croatia to the blocs passport-free Schengen area while rejecting the candidacies of Bulgaria and Romania.
